name: 城堡与莫梭提斯(Castle & Myosotis)
description:
——

一个中篇故事。主要是讲在类似中世纪时代，一个建立在岛屿上弱势，信仰海神的神权政治国家的王子帕索斯——一只有着灰色鬃毛的黑色狮子兽人，由于成年后的某个夜晚突然发现自己的脖子上长出了鳃，而这在他的国家传说中代表诅咒和厄运，作为王子的他在冲动与恐惧下逃到了海峡外的敌国，遇到了一只灰狼兽人……

This is mainly about the prince Pathos, a black lion with a gray mane, who lived in a weak island country that believed in the God of the sea in a medieval-like world. One night after he was an adult, he suddenly found gills growing on his neck, which represented curse and calamity in his national legend. As a prince, he fled under impulse and fear to the enemy country outside the Strait, There , met a gray wolf.(sorry my English is weak...

——

游戏内容很多，前期有很多描写色情的部分，但这不是一个色情游戏，在两个周目后还有几个小故事。主线流程存在一定的叙事手法，设置很多疑点，随着游戏流程的推进都会一一解答。游戏有6个结局再加上1个隐藏结局。

目前只有中文版本，而且还没有实装立绘与cg，只有背景图片。

游戏包含较多的R-18内容，兽人，同性恋，肉体破坏，血腥，请注意。

如果发现任何bug或者关于剧情上的疑问，希望改进的方面或者单纯想和我说点什么都可以来评论！！

There is a lot of content in the game with many pornographic parts in the early stage, but this is not a pornographic game. There are several stories after two weeks. In the whole game principal line contains some narrative techniques, and many doubtful points will be solved one by one with the progress of the game process. The game has 6 endings and 1 hidden ending.

 At present, there is only Chinese version, and there is no real vertical drawing and CG, only the background image.

Game contains more R-18 content, furry, gay, physical destruction, bloody, please note.

If you find any bugs or questions about the plot,  find some game parts that you want to improve or just want to say something to me, you can comment!!
